name: Black Island (itch) (UndreamedPanic)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO OF A GAME IDEA I HAD LONG TIME AGO, I AM PLANNING ON MAKING THIS A FULL GAME IF IT SEEMS INTERESTING ENOUGH.

You are John Parker in 1975. You are a detective looking into the disappearance of Annie, a missing persons case. She mysteriously disappeared at the end of a strange week. She was seen acting weird and sometimes acting strange to people she knew. Her sister doesn't think she left on her own, she thinks there is more too it!

CONTROLS:
Movement - WASD
Notebook - TAB
Interact - E
Dialogue - E
